architectural_notes: Product catalog with images and descriptions
Shopping cart and checkout flow required
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero banner background image with soft floral motifs in gold and teal on cream background, elegant and sophisticated (hero-floral.dim_1920x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog that displays clothing items with images, names, descriptions, prices, and available sizes
Implement shopping cart functionality allowing users to add items with selected sizes, view cart contents, update quantities, and remove items
Build a checkout flow with order summary and payment integration using Stripe
Design a modern, fashion-forward visual theme with elegant typography, warm earth tones, and clean minimalist layouts that emphasize product photography
Update the application name to 'Narie' throughout the frontend, including the HTML title, header navigation, and any other visible branding elements
Add the motto 'Elegance in Floral' as a tagline visible on the homepage and/or header, positioned elegantly near the brand name

Integrate the uploaded brand logo images (featuring the decorative gold floral emblem with teal accent and 'NARIE' text) as static assets throughout the application, including the header, favicon, and hero section
Update the hero section heading from 'Timeless Elegance' to align with the Narie brand identity and 'Elegance in Floral' motto, ensuring the new heading reflects the floral elegance theme

Refine the visual theme to incorporate floral elegance, using colors inspired by the uploaded logo (gold tones, teal accents, cream background) and ensuring the warm earth tone palette is adjusted to emphasize botanical sophistication

new_feature_requests.summary: Build e-commerce website with product catalog for clothing
